post.author: 이홍식
post.content:
POSTED AT 4:18 PM EDT Friday, September 13 U.S. still running on one cylinder By MATHEW INGRAM Globe and Mail Update
...So far, it looks as though anything tied to retail or housing and related sectors could do fairly well, but the rest of the market is a question mark. Telecom remains a black hole, judging by Lucent and Nortel, and Honeywell's warning certainly doesn't bode well for the industrial sector...
지금까지는 Retail 이나 Housing 그리고 그와 관련된 분야 꽤 잘 나갈 것으로 보이나 그외 시장은 의심스러움. Telecom(시장)은 여전히 black hole로 남아있음. Lucent와 Nortel의 (실적저조)경고로 판단컨데 다른 산업분야 역시 좋은 징조는 보이지 않음.
야후사전... bode1 － v. (bod·ed, bod·ing) <文> v.t. …을 예시하다; <사람에게> …의 전조가 되다(▶ 수동태 불가). ㆍ The weather ∼d a typhoon. 날씨를 보니 태풍이 올 것 같았다. ㆍ This ∼s us good fortune[＝good fortune for us]. 이것은 우리에게 좋은 징조이다.
－v.i. <well, ill과 함께> (사람에게 있어) 좋은[나쁜] 징조이다<for ‥>. ㆍ That ∼s well[ill] for you. 그것은 네게 좋은[좋지 않은] 징조이다.
Cambridge... bode (v) to be a sign of (esp. good or bad things) in the future As far as the company's future is concerned, these recently published figures bode ill/do not bode well. [I] There are fears that the hurricane bodes disaster for those areas in its path. [T] It is not yet clear what these changes will bode for the local community. [T]
post.title: bode
